label: Remembering
description: Recall relevant knowledge from memory (facts, terms, basic concepts).

label: Understanding
description: Explain ideas or concepts in your own words and identify relationships.

label: Applying
description: Use knowledge or procedures in new situations to solve problems.

label: Analyzing
description: Break information into parts, detect patterns, and explain how they connect.

label: Evaluating
description: Critically assess ideas or methods and justify conclusions with evidence.

label: Creating
description: Generate original products or reorganise knowledge into new patterns.
